name: Zenfone 3
description: ZenFone 3 is an agile, exquisite design inspired by the beauty of nature.

specs.Color: Glass finish : Sapphire Black/Moonlight White/Shimmer Gold
specs.Storage: eMCP 32GB / 64GB / Micro SD Card up to2 TB
specs.Sensors: Accelerator/E-Compass/Gyroscope/Proximity sensor/Hall sensor/Ambient light sensor/RGB sensor/IR sensor (Laser Focus)/Fingerprint
specs.Ports: USB Type-C 2.0 3.5mm audio jack(1 Head phone / Mic-in)
